website_summaries.verdict: Simple in terms of look in feel, however this set has the ability to blow your culinary socks off in terms of performance.
pros: This set is highly touted for its sharpness as well as resistance to kitchen culprits that tend to wear out your kitchen utensils
Ideal for everyday use, however they are not made for holiday carvings
A great starter set for those in new dwellings
cons: According to customers, a knife may break unexpectedly and if so, contact Amazon.com right away

customer_reviews.title: Good everyday knives
customer_reviews.text: These knives are very lite and easy to use sturdy and take a bashing. I got these for the kitchen assistants at work to use they are not pro knives but good enough for every day use and have stayed nice and sharp for several week so far with lots and lots of use. Would recommend. Box looks a little cheap but that’s not what your paying for.
customer_reviews.author: LH

customer_reviews.title: Useful
customer_reviews.text: Love these knives and peelers, however, they are very sharp! I have used the knives on carrots; potatoes; tomatoes celery; garlic and butternut squash no problem whatsoever. I use them on a food grade chopping board. I am very pleased with the set.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Taremae

customer_reviews.title: Love These Knives!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these knives! They work magnificently. So smooth and easy to use and maneuver. Very ergonomically comfortable while using. They clean so easily and so well too. I really like the covers to keep them from getting dull in the drawer with the other knives. They have slight flexibility as well, which makes using them so easy! As far as price standpoint, I would expect to pay at least double or triple the price for the quality you are receiving.
customer_reviews.author: SherBear

customer_reviews.title: Watch you digits
customer_reviews.text: These are not the first ceramic knives I have owned. I chose these because of their similarity to the previous set to compliment the two still left. I had forgotten how sharp the "New knives" are. I normally "roll" my fingers and thumb to avoid injury, even so, the first time I used the medium knife I cut the very tip of my thumb but did not realize until I noticed the blood on the potato. GREAT BUY AND THE KNIVES ARE AS ADVERTISED. CAUTION: They are extremely sharp.
customer_reviews.author: Old and Still Kicking

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product! Very gentle and sharp
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful product! Very gentle and sharp. Poor reviews show that people do not read instructions how to use these knives.
customer_reviews.author: Lyudmila

customer_reviews.title: Sharp knives that stay sharp!
customer_reviews.text: Great addition to the kitchen cutlery. I've used them a lot since purchasing and have been very happy with them. I purchased this particular set because the handle placement allows enough blade to be exposed to allow the entire sharpened blade length to contact the cutting board making repetetive slicing and chopping to work better for me. I have a set of ceramic knives that has the handle protruding about 1/4 inch below the sharp cutting edge making it difficult to use for chopping unless the handle clears the edge of the cutting board, These work better for me.
customer_reviews.author: Richard J. Ladd

customer_reviews.title: Great knife for quick jobs
customer_reviews.text: This replaced a set I bought several years ago that was stolen when our house was robbed. These are very convenient knives for quick jobs and are very easy to clean after use. They are sharp. I don’t think they are quite as sharp as Kyocera but I’m not positive about that. The only negative I have is that you have to be very careful not to cut your finger with the corner of the knife blade. After a couple of nicks you’ll get the hang of it. Clearly this did not bother me enough to spend $40 for one Kyocera knife when I paid about $15 for these three. I recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: GREAT VALUE
customer_reviews.text: My wife likes the sharpness of ceramic knives. This set offers the three sizes she uses most. They fit into our wooden block perfectly. I would recommend these knives. They really are Wacool as the name implies!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent knife set
customer_reviews.text: Really like this set of knives. Visually striking, with their colourful handles, and white blades, they look unusual, and pretty cool. They are comfortable to use, good grip, and feel sharp and strong. Each of the knives has a little blade cover as well, though I can see us binning them - they're fine, but just a bit of extra unnecessary clutter. All in all, highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Francis

customer_reviews.title: These are a real bang for the buck
customer_reviews.text: Oh THESE WORK!! Never had ceramic before.. Like I have been using some drek Ginsu knives bought from HSN decades ago which were pretty bad even when new. Have had them sharpened..and I hesitate to use that term. So the price was kller on these wacool. I cur the heck out of my thumb..so yes they work and they are very sharp and I am pleased. Its possible that a real chef might not be so enamored but I am an amateur and am soo grateful I came across these because many ceramic knives are just too pricey for me..Good jonb, Wacool.
customer_reviews.author: alymargo

customer_reviews.title: Great knives with multiple uses.
customer_reviews.text: Love these knives. Extremly sharp. One slip and opps! I been looking for a set like these for a long time. They are perfect. I had my adult daughter use them. It slipped and got her finger good. I would suggest the cutting gloves for these. I find them better than carbon steel knives. I like the different sizes.. Not recomended to use on glass cutting boards. Slices tomatoes into thin pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Stay

customer_reviews.title: The knife are made with good quality, but i can not say the same for the package
customer_reviews.text: i bought these set of ceramic knife and they are made very good quality also each one has the protection to avoid that i cut my finger ! The package arrived in super fast shipping but the package is arrived damaged maybe carrier fault but the outside package and internal package was damaged ! Today i tried the knife to cut the fish and it is very precise and they are easy to clean!
customer_reviews.author: Chiara

customer_reviews.title: Hands Down the Best!
customer_reviews.text: After trying several other brands these win hands down! In reference to negative reviews...ceramic blades, by the nature of what they are, have fragile blades which is one of the reasons they come with covers. I love a set I’ve had for a few years and got tired of transporting them back and forth from my RV. So, after trying other brands, these are hands down the best! Extremely sharp and well made.
customer_reviews.author: TampaBay

customer_reviews.title: Great deal for super sharp knives!
customer_reviews.text: Ceramic knives are extremely sharp, but the catch is that they are prone to break if they aren't used properly. Perhaps these are even more prone to break, as one has broken already, and I haven't been misusing them. But I must say, they are so sharp, and inexpensive, I'm probably just going to replace them with the same set if any more of them break.
customer_reviews.author: Wang Dangler

customer_reviews.title: Ceramic knives
customer_reviews.text: These knives are a good buy for the money. They are handy for cutting vegetables and fruits as the item doesn't turn brown after being cut with the ceramic knives. They are inexpensive enough that if you should break one, you can replace it. I have had mine for over a year and they are still sharp, and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: floridagal

customer_reviews.title: Why My Wife Liked the WACOOL Ceramic Knife Set
customer_reviews.text: Recently I purchased the 3 piece WACOOL Knife Set. She was extremely happy to receive them. They are easy for her to use. They are easy to clean. Unlike metal knives, they are light weight. The knives are durable. Unlike metal knives, that need to be sharpened, the ceramic knives remain sharp. I have also used these knives and like them as well as she does. In addition to everything else, the price we paid for the set was very reasonable. We both highly recommend these knives.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Stone

customer_reviews.title: Best Knives Ever!
customer_reviews.text: These knives are great! With arthritis in my hands, cooking is sometimes a challenge. I had bought a small ceramic paring knife several years ago and found it to be super sharp and easier on my hands for small tasks. When I saw this knife set I had to order! Now I rarely use any of my older knives. Just a word of warning - these knives are so sharp they will cut you in a heartbeat, so handle with care!
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Porcelain knives are THE Best !
customer_reviews.text: If you have always wanted to try porcelain knives because you aren’t good about sharpening you knives. This is a great starter set. Maybe you already have a block of knives( all dull?) but don’t worry about where you will put these because they come with there own sheaths ! BAM! They also make a great gift. They are my go to gift for men who like to cook. Most have not tried them and they are a great value for the money
customer_reviews.author: Kendra Lamb

customer_reviews.title: Awesome knives
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this set. I have one and bought one for my mom as well. Best knives I've owned and i have ALOT of knives. Yes they can break but they are so sharp and cheap that it makes up for it, if they break, buy more. I've had mine for 5 months now and havent broke any. I used the biggest to carve a Turkey even and it made easy work.
customer_reviews.author: Mat Ban

customer_reviews.title: Yes.
customer_reviews.text: I love ceramic knives. They do not get dull. These knives ifes are razor sharp and they stay that way. They are so sharp, in fact, that I had loaded the dishwasher with one with its blade up. Clearly this was a blunder, as when I reached down to adjust the utensil next to it, I stabbed myself in the hand. Great news - the knife was so sharp I didn't even feel it. The knives seem durable - dropped em a few times and no problem. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great knives
customer_reviews.text: These are some of the best knives I've ever used in the kitchen. They're extremely sharp so be careful if you have a little one helping you in the kitchen. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Lizzy H.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic customer service!
customer_reviews.text: I'm giving them 5 star because the knifes works pretty well and the owner of the company reached out to me and provided me an outstanding customer service with a small issue I had with one of the knifes. This is the quality we should received and the kind of service we should also expect. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Rafael Fco. Ceara Batlle

customer_reviews.title: Garbage...Fake reviews in exchange for $50
customer_reviews.text: EDIT: AFTER POSTING THIS REVIEW, I RECEIVED AN EMAIL FROM SOMEONE TO CHANGE MY REVIEW TO 5 STARS IN EXCHANGE FOR $50. Just a heads up that these 5 star reviews may not be genuinely Garbage. Just received them today, washed them, and one knife already broke. Will be returning and asking for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Awesome knives
customer_reviews.text: These knives are awesome! I had never heard of a ceramic knife until I visited my stepson recently. He had some, so after I tried them, I had to have some too. Supposedly you never (or rarely) have to sharpen them. Since I've only had and used mine for a week or so, I can't address how they'll do in the long run, but out of the box they are very sharp. Time to throw away some of my dull metal knives.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Nice set
customer_reviews.text: These knives have a good feel and are pretty sharp. Be careful because you can easily cut yourself. I've had other ceramic knives made by another manufacturer that the handles broke, not the blade, the handle. I'm hoping these hold up better. So far I'm very happy.
customer_reviews.author: C. L. Kehoe

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the price
customer_reviews.text: These 3 ceramic knives are perfectly adapted to all my kitchen need. It is good that they come with sheaths so you can store them easily and not accidentally hurt yourself while digging in the drawer to find them. The box can be kept to store them as well, but it is not high quality enough to be used for gifting in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Nina Segura

customer_reviews.title: Happy with these knives!
customer_reviews.text: I’m really enjoying these knives. I’ve had them about a month. They are easy to handle and at least so far are very sharp; they even pass the slicing of the tomato test. The much more expensive knives may be a tiny bit sharper but my experience is that the price difference doesn’t justify this tiny difference. All ceramic knives are delicate and again my experience is that eventually there will be a mishap and they will snap; including the most expensive. It doesn’t feel so bad when what snaps is a fraction of the price. This is also a useful size trio. Yes, as the home chef, I heartily recommend these knives.
customer_reviews.author: Julianne

customer_reviews.title: Completely satisfied
customer_reviews.text: The price was right so I bought 2 sets. I gave one as a gift and tried out a set. I love them. They cut so well. I had never had a set like this and will in the future be buying this set as a gift. Be careful, will break.
customer_reviews.author: M. Shirley

customer_reviews.title: Cheap..chipped..on nothing just veggies.
customer_reviews.text: These..highly praised knives...are a overated..cheaply made.. Product. I had them..for 3 days..nit using them for heavy duty cutting...just veggies..onions..peppers..and they are already chipped...one in front ..and topside edge..which is hard to cut anything..so high in that top edge area. The other has two more..chips..the one we never have use..is intact. So if you just want them for display..then..buy them...but for use..do not waste your money. Yes..we wash them by hand..and dry them..then used..shields.
customer_reviews.author: Juliet

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly not very sharp & Came apart after a year
customer_reviews.text: Maybe less...bonding agent that holds the blade in the cheap handle broke down after ? 9 months, rendering the knife useless....Its okay because I wanted to get a new one anyway - this one just never was very sharp...which is sort of the whole reason you get a ceramic knife. Very unimpressive from day one. Updated June 2020 - the company tried to buy back my negative review by "promising to send me money" - first $25 then finally $40 - to take down my review. I declined.
customer_reviews.author: C. Mark Burgess

customer_reviews.title: It works for now,
customer_reviews.text: These knives WORK. They are absolute pristine sharpness, at least for my uses. I am no chef so I won't say anything about how a "real" sharpened knife would work better, I wouldn't know. But so far just for in-house uses, it's the sharpest thing I've ever cut with and it's for a ridiculously good price. I've only received it last week so we'll see how far the sharpness lasts but personally I would recommend giving this a shot!
customer_reviews.author: Shaun

customer_reviews.title: would recommend
customer_reviews.text: I am happy with my order, it arrived in time. I would recommend this really nice set of good quality knives, with non slippery handles, pleasurable to use and for a good price.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn N.

customer_reviews.title: Knife guard design is dangerous
customer_reviews.text: Like many ceramic knives, these come with plastic knife guards to protect the edge and the users hands. Unfortunately, the knife guard has holes in it which are big enough to let a finger tip through, creating an unnecessary and subtle hazard. CAUTION: If the knife guard is held carelessly while re-inserting the knife, serious injury can result. As the knife moves through the guard, its point and edge track across several large through-holes. Any finger tip protruding through these holes will be guillotined.
customer_reviews.author: K Charles

customer_reviews.title: These knives are great and one would not know how versatile these knives ...
customer_reviews.text: These knives are great and one would not know how versatile these knives are until you try it. Cutting, paring and boning. Only precaution: cannot be used to chop and it will ding. This is what flint stone would have preferred.
customer_reviews.author: simon shum

customer_reviews.title: Nice knives
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I have had several ceramic knives and this set is as good as any other especially considering the price. Time will tell about the durability of these knives but honestly for the price I don't really care. These knives will get abused and eventually replaced.
customer_reviews.author: Stompkins111

customer_reviews.title: Dull
customer_reviews.text: I found these knives to be quite dull when I received them. I have received other ceramic knives that were quite sharp and these were a dissapointment Update:. Wacool has incredible customer service. They reached out to me after I submitted my reviewand exceeded my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Chris S

customer_reviews.title: 1 of 3 arrived pre-broken
customer_reviews.text: I bought this knife set last month and had only used the smallest knife until yesterday, when I pulled the middle knife from it's sheath to find the blade broken! Possibly from shopping, who knows. Looked fine when in it's sheath. If it was that easy to break when wrapped inside a box, how long until the others break from normal use? I have another set made by Kyocera that lasted six years and suffered only a small chip in one blade.
customer_reviews.author: Nope

customer_reviews.title: wicked sharp
customer_reviews.text: Very sharp and love the shape of the handles, time will tell can they hold that edge as well as the leading brand? Edit: reduced to 3 stars, after 9 months 2 of them have very tiny chips on the edge, wonder where those chips went? The largest one is holding it's sharpness but the other 2 are not, they are ok but no longer tomato cutters. Stick with the leading brand, It's well worth the price compared to these, no chips and good edge retention after 6 years.
customer_reviews.author: LancetheUglyAndrogyne

customer_reviews.title: Very brittle ceramic knives
customer_reviews.text: Thought was a great deal. Knife set arrived promptly, looked just like other ceramic knives I have bought. Very first time I used any of the knives, just to cut a medium onion, the middle size knife snapped in pieces!
customer_reviews.author: Joselle

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: I got these knives for my son, that love to smoke meats and BarBQ a lot. I thought these Wacool knives would alaw him to get real nice clean cuts to his meats and cut just about anything. They look and feel great and are vary sharp.
customer_reviews.author: Crafty Gal

customer_reviews.title: Sharp. cheap, not best quality
customer_reviews.text: At 3 knives for under $20, these are a reasonable bargain. They are not the same quality as a Kyocera and are not as comfortable to use for long. In particular, although the handle is comfortable to hold, there is not enough clearance between the handle and the heel for your fingers to do any serious chopping/mincing. As usual, you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: J. Henningson

customer_reviews.title: Good knives but not durable
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set of knives to replace the old japanese one I've been using 5 years. The new ones are good in price, they are light, comfy to handle and different sizes. After using the same knife every day for 2 weeks I observe that it's already lost some sharpness... With no sharpener in the set, this seems to be a single use item. Overall, it's OK for the price though.
customer_reviews.author: Argia

customer_reviews.title: Read before buying.....it's not a bad review just a FYI
customer_reviews.text: I'm giving it 3 stars. My wife loves these but I like a heavy steel knife with a one piece boande and tange. They were super sharp when we got them but after a few uses I find them dull. I'm not sure if I can take a stone or steal to them without damaging them but they're very inexpensive
customer_reviews.author: Laura Howard

customer_reviews.title: Not sharp enough
customer_reviews.text: The knives are comfortable to hold, but not that sharp. My test of sharpness is if a knife will cut cleanly through an over-ripe cherry tomato without squishing it down or ripping the skin. This set did not pass. This set did pass: Zyliss Black Ceramic Paring Knife Set with Soft-Grip Handles, 2-Pair | E920125U
customer_reviews.author: Douglas

customer_reviews.title: Glad I had a long fingernail because I like my ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set for myself and since then I have bought 2 to give as gifts and told another friend about them and he bought a set. These are really sharp. So sharp that I cut a small piece of a finger nail and did not even feel the resistance when I cut it. Glad I had a long fingernail because I like my finger tips. These come with a really nice protective sleeve to store them in. Nice product at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Farley

customer_reviews.title: Broke into pieces
customer_reviews.text: Updating my review. Within 2 weeks of using knife, it breaks into two pieces! Not a good sign, Great super sharp knives at a reasonable price. I love them
customer_reviews.author: karma2201

customer_reviews.title: Brittle
customer_reviews.text: It says not to wash in a dishwasher. I figured why not, it isn't going to rust. One snapped from something shifting onto it. They are very sharp. They are not like metal which can flex if bent a bit. Follow directions. Don't use for anything but cutting, and don't use a dishwasher.
customer_reviews.author: Karl P. Henselin

customer_reviews.title: Good blades
customer_reviews.text: I really like these but my wife does not, lol. She is really rough on utensils and does not like things that can't be thrown in dishwasher. They are sharp as a razor and I love them. If you want some ceramic blades give these a try.
customer_reviews.author: JW320

customer_reviews.title: These are about as good at cutting bread and cheese as steel knives
customer_reviews.text: I've been using Kyocera ceramic knives for years. There's an enormous gap between these and them. These are about as good at cutting bread and cheese as steel knives. They do the job, and they're good for the price point, but they're not my favorite. I'll keep using them and see how they turn out.
customer_reviews.author: David Jaenisch

customer_reviews.title: Not really a good buy
customer_reviews.text: Not the best buy I ever made. Too light for cutting anything except small items like onions and peppers. The largest should cut cabbage but impossible. Pushing and sawing is something I can't do. I have to put the knife over a potato and hit it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommended!
customer_reviews.text: Is advertised as being very sharp. Can't cut tomatoes, have to use my regular knife. You have to be careful not to break them, they seem to have too many cautionary suggestions. They DO cut raw chicken very well. Would not recommend! Good thing they are inexpensive.
customer_reviews.author: VAW

customer_reviews.title: the set is great, however the largest knife only lasted me about ...
customer_reviews.text: the set is great, however the largest knife only lasted me about 6 months, before a chunk of it broke off as I was dicing olives (no pitts, just soft olives). I'm still using the other two knives and am now ordering another big one.
customer_reviews.author: Elena Panchenko

customer_reviews.title: Excellent customer service
customer_reviews.text: The customer service was excellent. The product arrived on time and with nice protective sleeves for each knife. There was also follow up by WACOOL. The knives aren’t quite as sharp as I’d expected but they do a credible job of cutting. While they’re easy to hold and use, they’re not noticeably sharper than your newly sharpened knife. I haven’t had them long enough to know whether or not they keep that sharpness longer than most knives.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Sharp AF
customer_reviews.text: I cut a lot off veggies - and these knives get the job done. The knives have a good weight and balance to them. I can not comment on the toughness of the knives - since I haven't had a chance to cut any shoes in half or mince any soda cans. I can say that I've made thousands of chops through veggies and haven't had to sharpen yet. Overall, would reccomned.
customer_reviews.author: david

customer_reviews.title: Weight matters little with a knife this sharp!
customer_reviews.text: So far, I have used these knives on fruits and vegetables, not on meat. They are VERY sharp! I have been able to slice tomatoes very thin to fit perfectly on a sandwich. Slicing an apple is a cinch. Definitely recommended!
customer_reviews.author: R. Kearns

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: There is a reason these knives are inexpensive. The tip broke off the only sharp knife included in the bunch within two days of use. I used the knife the same way that I used my Farberware ceramic knife that I had for 8 years. Save your money - don't fall for the hype of this product.
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Excellent everyday use knife and great customer service.
customer_reviews.text: I first used these knives at a friend's place and was so impressed with it that I had to buy a pair for myself. These are great everyday use knives, especially for cutting fruits and veggies. They are sharp and you potentially could cut yourself deep. But if you are careful, they are great in maneuvering. Also, great customer service- very prompt and efficient. I had a trouble with one of the knives as it broke off at the tip. After informing the customer service, within a week they sent me an entire new set!
customer_reviews.author: Sukhada Kulkarni

customer_reviews.title: Work well enough.
customer_reviews.text: Knives are not user friendly, angle of handle to blade is not comfortable, needs constant sharpening. Slicing is good, chopping not so much. Good beginner set of knives for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Blacky

customer_reviews.title: Break easily and the blade take on colors of food
customer_reviews.text: They are nice little knives and cut very well but do not stay intact for more than a few months. All of them broke pieces of after a few months and I had to throw them away. Also, the blade become dark or red when you cut beet, for example. Cannot be cleaned except maybe in bleach which I did not try.
customer_reviews.author: Eva Jansen

customer_reviews.title: Razor Sharp with an outstanding Price!
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! I’ve been using these about a week. I love Ceramic knives and these did not dissappint. They are razor sharp (clumsy me I’ve already cut myself twice). They cut through the toughest meat like butter. I love The way the handle feels in my hand and the ease of cleaning them! Wonderful value on this set!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Boyett

customer_reviews.title: Two knives broke within a month.
customer_reviews.text: I used the knives daily cutting vegetables including potatoes and carrots. After one week, the blade broke at the insertion point at the handle. Another week later another one of the knives did the same. These knives are not durable.
customer_reviews.author: 1d655480

customer_reviews.title: Great quality knives
customer_reviews.text: Even cut through potatoes like butter lol. Ok not butter but very easy to make natural potato chips
customer_reviews.author: Greg Wright

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Knife Set!
customer_reviews.text: These ceramic knives are very sharp and stay that way. Nice easy grip handle and have a nice blade cover. Cant drop them or pry with them, as ceramic is very strong but brittle. 100% Satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: BigSkyGuy

customer_reviews.title: Good Knife Set
customer_reviews.text: Ceramic knives are wonderful! These are good, though helpful the plastic guards have a silly bit of decoration that makes them seem cheap. They'll be a wedding gift soon and I'm sure will be used for many, many years.
customer_reviews.author: LitLady

customer_reviews.title: Stain easily, not as sharp as I'd hoped
customer_reviews.text: I have used ceramic knives before and the others I had used were amazingly sharp, but one was chipped during the cleaning process. Was looking to replace. These knives are satisfactory-ish. They mostly get the job done, but I can say for sure, they aren't as sharp as my other ceramic set. Also, noticed the large knife has a yellow tinge to it-been using them a lot over the past few weeks, but I didn't think they would yellow!
customer_reviews.author: JSP

customer_reviews.title: sharpe blade
customer_reviews.text: I juice in the mornings and nothing beats a ceramic knife when it come to cutting fruits and vegetables. Wacool is not as expensive as the others but performs just as good.
customer_reviews.author: Ken Harper

customer_reviews.title: Does its job
customer_reviews.text: The price seemed very good for set of 3 knives, but you definitely will see why... It’s more fragile than my previous one , and the handle is thinner , so it is not as comfortable. But in general it does its job good.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Blade snapped off after one month use
customer_reviews.text: I thought this set was reasonably priced, but after one month of standard use, like vegetable chopping, the ceramic blade snapped off from inside the handle of the medium sized knife. Please be careful when using these knives for anything harder than butter.
customer_reviews.author: Jess S

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product and price
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these knives! I started using them the day I received them, and every day since. Granted, I haven't had them that long, but so far no problems. They come with nice, study blade guards. I was expecting to get the product delivered in two days, but actually received them the day after ordering (1day), which was a very nice surprise! I would recommend this product/seller.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cuts tomatoes like cutting through warm butter.
customer_reviews.text: I really like this set of knives. They are sharp and cut tomatoes easily, however I was using the knife to cut squash and the knife blade snapped in half.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda B.

customer_reviews.title: FABULOUS KNIFE SET!
customer_reviews.text: We've been looking at ceramic knives for a while now but hadn't found a set we liked. We got this set and they are now our go-to knives. These have been great for meal prep and make slicing/dicing veggies a breeze. This is not a paid review. I'm an honest-to-goodness customer who is seriously considering buying a few more of these knife sets to give as holiday gifts this year.
customer_reviews.author: Debby

customer_reviews.title: but they don't cut through stuff easily because of the extra thick blades and inadequate sharpening ...
customer_reviews.text: Odd sharpening angle on these. The are very sharp, but they don't cut through stuff easily because of the extra thick blades and inadequate sharpening angle. I get the thick blades part, the aren't as easy to break. Can only use these to cut soft stuff where overall blade thickness is not a problem.
customer_reviews.author: tm

customer_reviews.title: Need help from seller!!!
customer_reviews.text: Super sharp, lightweight. Not sure why, but while slicing potatoes, the orange knife chipped. Gratefully, I found the chip before I cooked them. I really love the knives, but, now what? Please help. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Rosie

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Was bought as a gift for my daughter and husband. They love them!! They work wonderful and now need to be careful that they have sharp knives!
customer_reviews.author: mmcgee2705

customer_reviews.title: Love these knives
customer_reviews.text: I have loved ceramic knives every since first introduces to them. Sharp enough to slice a finger. Stays sharp. Each to chip though other brands are not quite as fragile. For the price this is a great set of knives.
customer_reviews.author: Allenfarm

customer_reviews.title: Sharp and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I really like how these are very sharp. Less effort to cut and easy to clean and doesn't stick to cheese. Steel knives always stick to cheese and make cutting difficult. Wish I had found these years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: SHARP!
customer_reviews.text: brittle (as are all ceramic knives), so don't get unless you will handle and store with care. easy veggie cutting. very sharp is very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Thevaluator

customer_reviews.title: best knife set ever
customer_reviews.text: these knives are so sharp but the ergonomic handle and feel of the knife is amazing cuts anything like it’s cutting through butter
customer_reviews.author: Severine Gorby

customer_reviews.title: Bad and Unsafe
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these knives twice and had to send both sets back. They were actually crooked, almost warped like. When I would cut into something like an orange it would make a curved cut. I almost cut myself on a few occasions. They are very thin and too flexible, witch makes them dangerous. I always use ceramic knives and theses are not good quality! Sorry!
customer_reviews.author: JN

customer_reviews.title: Breaks easily
customer_reviews.text: Love ceramic knives! However, after using for only a couple of weeks, one of the knives cracked and I had only been using it to chop apples. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Mdunn

customer_reviews.title: Knives crack! Pieces in food.
customer_reviews.text: Will only last a month. They will chip and you will not notice the chip until you’re cleaning the knife after usage. Which of course by then you’ve eaten. I hope I don’t die. :)
customer_reviews.author: SSela81

customer_reviews.title: Nice knives, work well.
customer_reviews.text: These are nice & sharp. After getting used to using them, they are great. Actually, my thinner and more expensive ceramic knives break easily. So this is an update after using them daily.
customer_reviews.author: Cari'anne

customer_reviews.title: These Knives Are SHARP!
customer_reviews.text: Light easy to use set of knives with a great cutting edge. These have quickly became my go to knives for most culinary needs.
customer_reviews.author: TAS

customer_reviews.title: WACOOL Ceramic Knife Set 3-Piece
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these knives in July 2019. I had no problem with them until today. I attempted to slice an onion with the 5 inch blade and it broke in half. It wasn't a large onion, medium size.
customer_reviews.author: Lorraine T. Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Broke Over Broccoli
customer_reviews.text: I received these knives in the beginning of June and after just over two months, my favorite one snapped while cutting BROCCOLI! Super bummed because I love these knives and that one was my favorite.
customer_reviews.author: Russell Tyson Jr.

customer_reviews.title: dull blades in less than 10 days
customer_reviews.text: I was very disappointed with this items. It started being very well, however, I started to notice the blades were not sharp in about a week. Today, I throw one of the knives away, since it was almost dangerous to use. A dull blade has a danger of cutting yourself. It may be easy to clan, easy to hold, but it does not cut well, it is not a good knife.
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: A decent starter set of Ceramic knives
customer_reviews.text: These are the first ceramic knives I have had, so I can't really compare to others. They are super-sharp, and this is a nice set for various tasks.
customer_reviews.author: BlueCollarDrone

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my mom. She used the 5 inch knife to cut celery and it broke. This is the second set I bought because the first 5 inch knife broke as well but I thought it might have been what she was trying to cut. If celery breaks it then I would not recommend this set at all.
customer_reviews.author: jen major

customer_reviews.title: Knives stay sharp
customer_reviews.text: I love these knives but be careful not to use in a twisting motion, like coring an apple. The blade will snap. Otherwise they are excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Rivergirl

customer_reviews.title: Not so durable
customer_reviews.text: Got this knife recently but didn't last long. The knife is lightweight and sharp but the blade is delicate. The blade chipped off while cutting veggies on a chopping board. Better to order something made out of steel.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Always sharp.
customer_reviews.text: Use in kitchen only. These replaced previous we have used every day for 5 years. Never have to search for a sharp knife.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Reese

customer_reviews.title: Great Ceramic Knife Set
customer_reviews.text: Love this ceramic knife set. Very sharp and easy to use on fruits, vegetables and meats. Easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Sis

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Great knife set! Very sharp and keep there edge. My only issue is that the blade detached from the handle on my smallest knife. I had wash them and take good care of them so I'm not sure why it came apart. Other than that I absolutely love these knifes. Also I've had them for about 4 months.
customer_reviews.author: casey k trease

customer_reviews.title: Good value. The knives are smaller than I anticipated
customer_reviews.text: Good value. The knives are smaller than I anticipated, but maybe I just should have read the measurements more carefully. Update: after a couple months of nearly daily use, these knives have lost their edge and are considerably more dull than the knocked up cheapo knives I got these to replace.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Chipped knives
customer_reviews.text: Ours arrived chipped but cut nicely. If they did not arrive chipped, I would give it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Happy

customer_reviews.title: I like the knife set and they cut well
customer_reviews.text: I like the knife set and they cut well. However the large knife and handle have come apart. Not sure what bonding mechanism they used but it has failed a couple of weeks after started using. The two smaller knives are still in use. Follow up review: Wacool warranted the knife set. Appreciate the follow up!
customer_reviews.author: Jeff N.

customer_reviews.title: Be aware because they are very sharp.
customer_reviews.text: I have nothing negative to say about the product. They are sharp, light and easy to handle.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Lura

customer_reviews.title: Amazed!
customer_reviews.text: I am amazed, HAPPY and surprised at the ability of these knives to cut through anything like it's soft butter! My stainless steel knives are so full even after sharpening but these are terrific. I'm a new fan of ceramic knives.
customer_reviews.author: Sharzann

customer_reviews.title: I love this ceramic knife set!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this ceramic knife set to replace one I had that my husband broke while trying to cut raw chicken. They are not meat to cut bones. They are great for fruits and vegetables, especially or slicing onions and tomatoes. They are very sharp and easy to clean. I love the bright colors and the variety of sizes.
customer_reviews.author: MB

customer_reviews.title: Holds edge a long time.
customer_reviews.text: Outlasts any metal knife. Very sharp and holds its edge for a long time. Good grip.
customer_reviews.author: grammiecolorstoo

product_meta.title: WACOOL Ceramic Knife Set 3-Piece (Includes 6-inch Chef's Knife, 5-inch Utility Knife and 4-inch Fruit Paring Knife), with 3 Knife Sheaths for Each Blade (Black Handle)
feature_bullets: The ceramic knife delivers exceptionally less surface resistance and a ruthlessly razor sharp edge. You need to try it to believe it.
Ultra sharp, will never rust, nor absorb oils, odors, acids, or salts. Impervious to chemical leakage, spectacularly light, with a perfectly engineered balance and 15x the edge retainment of steel.

Made from a proprietary blend of the highest quality zirconia and forged utilizing state of the art Cold Isostatic Pressing process (CIP) before being super heated, our blades are sharper, harder, stronger, lighter, and more beautiful.
Classic white blade and black handle. Include matching BPA free PerfectFit sheaths for each blade. Chef knife, paring knife, utility knife.

An ideal gift - Birthday, wedding, anniversary, mom, dad, wife, husband, and those who cook in your life. We stand behind our knives and customers with a 100% SATISFACTION OR MONEY BACK GUARANTEE, try it risk free, we know you'll love them.
